title: KALEIDOSCOPE ART MAGAZINE FONT
content:
Does anybody know the font the Art Magazine KALEIDOSCOPE uses?  
It’s seems familiar to me, but it’s neither a Sackers Gothic or a Kabel or something like that.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [intervistatest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172521/http:/typophile.com/files/intervistatest.jpg) | 93.37 KB |
author: fraukrause

comments.content: … here is [the link to Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172521/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface/viewfonts) from HI.
Great! That’s it. Thank you for your quick reply!!
